name: Managing in the Information Economy
description: Topics include identifying, managing and exploiting information assets, the opportunities and limits of dealing with Big Data, the impact of digitalization of information, managing under complexity, globalization, and the rise of the network economy. Students will explore a topic in greater depth through the writing of a research paper.
prerequisites: MGSC01H3 or MGIC01H3 or enrolment in the Specialist/Specialist (Co-op) program in Management and Information Technology (BBA).
